name: The Last Raclette
description:
The last night of Winter warms up as the dawn of Spring is coming... Quick, your friends are waiting for you. For the time the last Raclette has come...

Presentation :

We are a team of french students in Computer Science. This project as been made in 4 days for a video games class work, organized by our University, IUT de Montreuil. Making this project has a game jam one, we had a theme which we had to respect : "Cold".

How to play :

  • ↑ : Jump
  • ← : Left
  • →: Right
  • ↓ : Down
  • R : Restart
  • Esc : Pause menu

Credits :

Paul "Boneco" Rynkiewicz - Alexandre "Wargen" Paprocki - Ludovic "Lblue" Chauliac - Guillaume "Undefr" Salvador

  • Graphics assets : 2D Platformer Winter, Foggy Mountains Parallax
  • Theme : Chillout Groove
  • Sounds : Footstep, Trempe, refroidissement, Ta Da, Game Over
